participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, creative, and nurturing. She has a strong desire to help others and enjoys planning events.
participant_1.background: I have a passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day. I lost my dog when I was 10 years old. I am colorblind. I enjoy a variety of foods, but my favorite is probably chocolate. My favorite book is Anne of Green Gables.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing, humorous, and a bit introverted. He prefers quiet settings and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I hate the taste of fish. I am really short. I am a happy person.

content.text: My favorite book is probably the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
I've heard good things about that! I've been meaning to read it.
It's a really funny book. The humor is a little bit dry, but it's really clever.
I'm sure I would like it! I love funny books.
My favorite food is probably chocolate.
Chocolate is delicious! It's one of my favorite desserts.
I love chocolate in all forms! I like it in candy, cake, ice cream, cookies, and even just by itself.
Me too! I love chocolate so much that I even have a chocolate fountain at my house.
That's amazing! I wish I had a chocolate fountain.
You should get one! They're really fun to have.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
